results.description: The EIB, the European Union's bank, is seeking to recruit for its Finance Directorate (FI) -Coordination and Financial Policies Division, at its headquarters in Luxembourg, a: (Junior) Data Governance Officer This is a full time position on 4/5 level This is a temporary replacement assignment of 1 year The EIB offers fixed-term contracts of up to a maximum of 6 years, according to business needs, with a possibility to convert to a permanent contract, subject to organisational requirements and i…
